createAccessCode.title: Create access code
createAccessCode.introduction: Use this form to create an access code every time you want to give someone access to Bloom.
createAccessCode.therapyAccess: Access to courses, 1:1 chat and six therapy sessions
createAccessCode.resultLink: Please tell the user to go to <welcomeURL></welcomeURL> where they can register using their email address.
createAccessCode.resultCode: Once registered, they can click on the account icon, choose the `Apply a code` option and use the following code: <partnerAccessCode></partnerAccessCode>

form.featuresLabel: Select support type offered to this user
form.featureTherapyLabel: Courses, 1:1 chat and six therapy sessions

errors.createPartnerAccessError: There was an error creating the access code. Try again or message the Bloom team.
errors.featureRequired: Select a support type before creating an access code

accessGuard.title: Access required
accessGuard.introduction: Your account does not include access to partner pages. If this doesn't seem right, <contactLink>message the Bloom team</contactLink>.
